vulnerability_findings.name: use-multiple-require
vulnerability_findings.message: Using multiple require statements is cheaper than using && multiple check combinations. There are more advantages, such as easier to read code and better coverage reports.

vulnerability_findings.name: uninitialized-state
vulnerability_findings.message:
MiniMeToken.balances (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#113) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- doTransfer (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#206-244)
	- balanceOfAt (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#323-344)
	- generateTokens (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#416-426)
	- destroyTokens (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#433-443)

vulnerability_findings.name: constant-function
vulnerability_findings.message: MiniMeToken.isContract (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#507-514) is declared view but contains assembly code

vulnerability_findings.name: incorrect-equality
vulnerability_findings.message:
ReserveTokensHolder.collectTokens (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#1357-1368) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(collectedTokens == 0 && finalizedTime > 0 && getTime() > finalizedTime.add(months(12)))

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#258-275):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount)) (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#269)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#272)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-no-eth
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in ReserveTokensHolder.collectTokens (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#1357-1368):
	External calls:
	- finalizedTime = contribution.finalizedTime() (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#1358)
	- balance = real.balanceOf(address(this)) (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#1362)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- collectedTokens (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#1364)

vulnerability_findings.name: unused-return
vulnerability_findings.message:
MiniMeToken.claimTokens (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#537-547) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(controller,balance) (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#545)

vulnerability_findings.name: unused-return
vulnerability_findings.message:
REALCrowdsale.claimTokens (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#1261-1274) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,balance) (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#1272)

vulnerability_findings.name: unused-return
vulnerability_findings.message:
ReserveTokensHolder.claimTokens (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#1387-1398) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,balance) (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#1396)

vulnerability_findings.name: shadowing-local
vulnerability_findings.message:
MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#474) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#517-519)

vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-benign
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in REALCrowdsale.initialize (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#863-900):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(REAL.totalSupply() == 0) (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#877)
	- require(bool)(REAL.controller() == address(this)) (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#878)
	- require(bool)(REAL.decimals() == 18) (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#879)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- destEthTeam (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#890)
	- destTokensBounties (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#899)
	- destTokensReserve (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#893)
	- destTokensTeam (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#896)
	- endBlock (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#887)
	- realController (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#882)
	- startBlock (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#886)

vulnerability_findings.name: assembly
vulnerability_findings.message:
MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#507-514)
	- ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#510-513

vulnerability_findings.name: constable-states
vulnerability_findings.message:
ERC20Token.totalSupply should be constant (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#719)
MiniMeToken.version should be constant (ReserveTokensHolderMock.sol#84)
